title: ‘There’s Not Much for Me to Gain in the Tour’: Van der Poel Recommits to MTB World Title Dream
content:
Van der Poel set for seismic showdown with Pogačar at Tour of Flanders before a summer that could center on cross country: 'We are thinking about how we can close the gap on Pogačar'.

Read the full article at ‘There’s Not Much for Me to Gain in the Tour’: Van der Poel Recommits to MTB World Title Dream on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
